page.title: 06SUBURBAN WILDLIFE ONE
page.content: This part of Worcester is a mixture of houses,factories and some open spaces.Even though it is mainly built up there is still a lot of wildlife to be seen if you look carefully.Factory building is making wildlife decrease by filling in{pools}and uprooting trees and slowly polluting the {canal. But in factories house martins nest and are doing well.Near Webb Fastners factory there is a small newt{pond which is being filled in and dead newts float to the top of the water.Near this{pond}is an old oak tree which has been pulled up.Quite close is the{canal.}Carp and other fish are quite common in the{canal} such as Bream,Gudgeon,Perch,Roach, Dace,Bleak,Chub and Pike and sometimes the odd{hybrid}which is both a Bream and Roach together.
